short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A work tracker for software developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A work tracker for software developers. Track daily & pending work right using the chrome extension or web app. 
Features:
➕  Add & View daily tasks
🕖  Assign deadlines to tasks
✅  Mark tasks as completed
✨  Group tasks by feature
📅  Add date to start/end a feature
🗒️  View daily work done
⏪  View complete work timeline
